1: מַדּ֗וּעַ <sup>4069 </sup> <n>Why</n> מִ֭שַּׁדַּי <sup>7706 </sup> <n>from the Almighty</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> נִצְפְּנ֣וּ <sup>6845 </sup> <n>are not hidden</n> עִתִּ֑ים <sup>6256 </sup> <n>Why seeing times</n> [וְיֹדְעֹו כ] (וְ֝יֹדְעָ֗יו <sup>3045 </sup> <n>acknowledge</n> ק) לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> חָ֥זוּ <sup>2372 </sup> <n>him not see</n> יָמָֽיו׃ <sup>3117 </sup> <n>age</n>

3: חֲמ֣וֹר <sup>2543 </sup> <n>the ass</n> יְתוֹמִ֣ים <sup>3490 </sup> <n>of the fatherless</n> יִנְהָ֑גוּ <sup>5090 </sup> <n>They drive away</n> יַ֝חְבְּל֗וּ <sup>2254 </sup> <n>for a pledge</n> שׁ֣וֹר <sup>7794 </sup> <n>ox</n> אַלְמָנָֽה׃ <sup>490 </sup> <n>the widow's</n>
4: יַטּ֣וּ <sup>5186 </sup> <n>They turn</n> אֶבְיוֹנִ֣ים <sup>34 </sup> <n>the needy</n> מִדָּ֑רֶךְ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>out of the way</n> יַ֥חַד <sup>3162 </sup> <n>themselves together</n> חֻ֝בְּא֗וּ <sup>2244 </sup> <n>hide</n> עֲנִיֵּי־ <sup>6035 </sup> <n>humble</n> אָֽרֶץ׃ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of the earth</n>
5: הֵ֤ן <sup>2005 </sup> <n>Behold</n> פְּרָאִ֨ים ׀ <sup>6501 </sup> <n>Behold [as] wild asses</n> בַּֽמִּדְבָּ֗ר <sup>4057 </sup> <n>in the desert</n> יָצְא֣וּ <sup>3318 </sup> <n>go they forth</n> בְּ֭פָעֳלָם <sup>6467 </sup> <n>to their work</n> מְשַׁחֲרֵ֣י <sup>7836 </sup> <n>rising betimes</n> לַטָּ֑רֶף <sup>2964 </sup> <n>for a prey</n> עֲרָבָ֥ה <sup>6160 </sup> <n>the wilderness</n> ל֥וֹ לֶ֝֗חֶם <sup>3899 </sup> <n>[yieldeth] food</n> לַנְּעָרִֽים׃ <sup>5288 </sup> <n>for them [and] for [their] children</n>
6: בַּ֭שָּׂדֶה <sup>7704 </sup> <n>in the field</n> בְּלִיל֣וֹ <sup>1098 </sup> <n>[every one] his corn</n> [יַקְצִירוּ כ] (יִקְצֹ֑ורוּ <sup>7114 </sup> <n>cut down</n> ק) וְכֶ֖רֶם <sup>3754 </sup> <n>the vintage</n> רָשָׁ֣ע <sup>7563 </sup> <n>of the wicked</n> יְלַקֵּֽשׁוּ׃ <sup>3953 </sup> <n>and they gather</n>
7: עָר֣וֹם <sup>6174 </sup> <n>They cause the naked</n> יָ֭לִינוּ <sup>3885 </sup> <n>to lodge</n> מִבְּלִ֣י <sup>1097 </sup> <n>without</n> לְב֑וּשׁ <sup>3830 </sup> <n>without clothing</n> וְאֵ֥ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>and have</n> כְּ֝ס֗וּת <sup>3682 </sup> <n>that [they have] no covering</n> בַּקָּרָֽה׃ <sup>7135 </sup> <n>in the cold</n>
